mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CNT) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.FMS_COMMAND_TBL WHERE COMMAND_WORK = 'MEM' AND COMMAND_LINE = 'SEARCH' AND COMMAND_STATUS = 'B' AND COMMAND_NO = ( SELECT COMMAND_NO FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_MEM_SH_TBL WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } AND TRAN_STATUS = 'B' ) AND TO_CHAR(INSERT_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDYYYYMMDDHH24') UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_MEM_SH_TBL WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } AND TRAN_STATUS = 'B' AND TO_CHAR(INSERT_DT, 'YYYYMMDDYYYYMMDDHH24') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDYYYYMMDDHH24') )

SELECT SUM(CNT) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.FMS_COMMAND_TBL WHERE COMMAND_WORK = 'MEM' AND COMMAND_LINE = 'CHANGE' AND COMMAND_STATUS = 'B' AND COMMAND_NO = ( SELECT COMMAND_NO FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_MEM_CH_TBL WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } AND TRAN_STATUS = 'B' ) AND TO_CHAR(INSERT_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDYYYYMMDDHH24') UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_MEM_CH_TBL WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } AND TRAN_STATUS = 'B' AND TO_CHAR(INSERT_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDYYYYMMDDHH24') )

SELECT SUM(CNT) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.FMS_COMMAND_TBL WHERE COMMAND_WORK = 'MEM' AND COMMAND_LINE = 'CANCEL' AND COMMAND_STATUS = 'B' AND COMMAND_NO = ( SELECT COMMAND_NO FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_MEM_DEL_TBL WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } AND TRAN_STATUS = 'B' ) AND TO_CHAR(INSERT_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDYYYYMMDDHH24') UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_MEM_DEL_TBL WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } AND TRAN_STATUS = 'B' AND TO_CHAR(INSERT_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDYYYYMMDDHH24') )

SELECT SUM(CNT) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.FMS_COMMAND_TBL WHERE COMMAND_WORK = 'MEM' AND COMMAND_LINE = 'APPLY' AND COMMAND_STATUS = 'B' AND COMMAND_NO = ( SELECT MAX(COMMAND_NO) FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_MEM_IF_TBL WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } AND TRAN_STATUS = 'B' ) AND TO_CHAR(INSERT_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDYYYYMMDDHH24') UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_MEM_IF_TBL WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } AND TRAN_STATUS = 'B' AND TO_CHAR(INSERT_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDYYYYMMDDHH24') )

SELECT SUM(CNT) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.FMS_COMMAND_TBL WHERE COMMAND_WORK = 'MEM' AND COMMAND_LINE = 'BCHANGE' AND COMMAND_STATUS = 'B' AND COMMAND_NO IN ( SELECT COMMAND_NO FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_MEM_BCH_TBL WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } AND TRAN_STATUS = 'B' ) AND TO_CHAR(INSERT_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDYYYYMMDDHH24') UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_MEM_BCH_TBL WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } AND TRAN_STATUS = 'B' AND TO_CHAR(INSERT_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDYYYYMMDDHH24') )
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.TFMS_UPSO WHERE UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND GBN IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.TFMS_UPSO WHERE UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND BANK_CODE = ( SELECT '0' || BANK_CD FROM GIBU.TFMS_BANK WHERE BRAN_CD IS NULL AND REMAK = 'Y' )
mapper.update: UPDATE GIBU.TFMS_UPSO SET GBN = # { gbn } WHERE UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND BANK_CODE = ( SELECT MIN(BANK_CODE) FROM GIBU.TFMS_UPSO WHERE UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } AND USE_YN = 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT UPSO_CD, UPSO_NM, OPBI_DAY, NEW_DAY, CLSBS_YRMN, VIRTUAL_YN, VIRTUAL_CNT, STAFF_CD, FIDU.GET_STAFF_NM(STAFF_CD) AS STAFF_NM FROM ( SELECT B.UPSO_CD, UPSO_NM, OPBI_DAY, NEW_DAY, CLSBS_YRMN, ( CASE WHEN COUNT(A.BANK_CODE) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) AS VIRTUAL_YN, COUNT(A.BANK_CODE) AS VIRTUAL_CNT, B.STAFF_CD FROM GIBU.TFMS_UPSO A, GIBU.TBRA_UPSO B WHERE A.UPSO_CD(+) = B.UPSO_CD AND A.USE_YN(+) = 'Y' AND B.BRAN_CD = # { branCd } GROUP BY B.UPSO_CD, UPSO_NM, OPBI_DAY, NEW_DAY, CLSBS_YRMN, B.STAFF_CD ) WHERE NOT ( VIRTUAL_YN = 'N' AND CLSBS_YRMN IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY VIRTUAL_CNT DESC, CLSBS_YRMN DESC

SELECT UPSO_CD, BANK_CODE AS BANK_CD, ( SELECT BANK_NM FROM ACCT.TCAC_BANK WHERE BANK_CD = A.BANK_CODE ) AS BANK_NM, ACCOUNT_NM AS REPTPRES, GIBU.FT_GET_ACCOUNT_FORMAT(VIRTUAL_ACCOUNT_NUM) AS ACCN_NUM, PAY_CHECK_YN, DEPOSIT, ON_TIME_YN, END_DAY, USE_YN, REMAK, NVL(MOD_DATE, INS_DATE) AS MOD_DATE FROM GIBU.TFMS_UPSO A WHERE UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY USE_YN DESC, BANK_CODE
SELECT GBN, UPSO_CD FROM GIBU.TFMS_UPSO WHERE UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND GBN IS NOT NULL

SELECT # { upsoCd } AS UPSO_CD, BANK_CODE AS BANK_CD, ( SELECT BANK_NM FROM ACCT.TCAC_BANK WHERE BANK_CD = '0' || A.BANK_CODE ) AS BANK_NM, ACCOUNT_NM AS REPTPRES, GIBU.FT_GET_ACCOUNT_FORMAT(VIRTUAL_ACCOUNT_NUM) AS ACCN_NUM, 'S' AS GBN, NVL(UPDATE_DT, INSERT_DT) AS UPDATE_DT FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_MEM_SH_RESULT_TBL A WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } AND COMMAND_NO = ( SELECT MAX(COMMAND_NO) FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_MEM_SH_RESULT_TBL WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } ) ORDER BY BANK_CODE

SELECT # { upsoCd } AS UPSO_CD, BANK_CODE AS BANK_CD, ( SELECT BANK_NM FROM ACCT.TCAC_BANK WHERE BANK_CD = '0' || A.BANK_CODE ) AS BANK_NM, ACCOUNT_NM AS REPTPRES, GIBU.FT_GET_ACCOUNT_FORMAT(VIRTUAL_ACCOUNT_NUM) AS ACCN_NUM, 'S' AS GBN, NVL(UPDATE_DT, INSERT_DT) AS UPDATE_DT FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_MEM_SH_RESULT_TBL A WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } AND PROC_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND COMMAND_NO = ( SELECT MAX(COMMAND_NO) FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_MEM_SH_RESULT_TBL WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } AND PROC_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ) ORDER BY BANK_CODE

SELECT SUM(CNT) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.FMS_COMMAND_TBL WHERE COMMAND_WORK = 'DEP' AND COMMAND_LINE = 'RESULT' AND COMMAND_STATUS = 'B' UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_DEPOSIT_IF_TBL WHERE RECV_TYPE = 'A' AND TRAN_STATUS = 'B' )

SELECT REPT_DAY, REPT_NUM, BANK_CD, ( SELECT BANK_NM FROM ACCT.TCAC_BANK WHERE BANK_CD = A.BANK_CD ) AS BANK_NM, GIBU.FT_GET_ACCOUNT_FORMAT(ACCN_NUM) AS ACCN_NUM, REPTPRES, REPT_AMT, MAPPING_DAY, RECV_DAY, NOTE_YRMN, GBN, GBN2 FROM ( SELECT 0 AS R_NUM, '' AS REPT_DAY, '' AS REPT_NUM, '0' || BANK_CODE AS BANK_CD, VIRTUAL_ACCOUNT_NUM AS ACCN_NUM, DEPOSIT_NAME AS REPTPRES, TO_NUMBER(DEPOSIT) AS REPT_AMT, '' AS MAPPING_DAY, DEPOSIT_DAY AS RECV_DAY, ' ~ ' AS NOTE_YRMN, DECODE(TRANSACTION_KIND, 'D', '???', '???') AS GBN, '?????' AS GBN2 FROM GIBU.FMS_VIRACC_DEPOSIT_RESULT_TBL WHERE MEMBER_ID = # { upsoCd } AND DEPOSIT_DAY = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND PROC_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') UNION ALL SELECT ROWNUM AS R_NUM, REPT_DAY, REPT_NUM, BANK_CD, ACCN_NUM, REPTPRES, REPT_AMT, MAPPING_DAY, RECV_DAY, NOTE_YRMN, '???' AS GBN, DECODE(GBN, '-', '?????', '????') AS GBN2 FROM ( SELECT A.REPT_DAY, A.REPT_NUM, A.BANK_CD, A.ACCN_NUM, A.REPTPRES, A.REPT_AMT, A.MAPPING_DAY, A.RECV_DAY, MIN(B.NOTE_YRMN) || ' ~ ' || MAX(B.NOTE_YRMN) AS NOTE_YRMN, NVL(NVL(B.UPSO_CD, C.UPSO_CD), '-') AS GBN FROM GIBU.TBRA_REPT_VIRTUAL A, GIBU.TBRA_NOTE B, GIBU.TBRA_REPT_BALANCE C WHERE A.UPSO_CD = # { upsoCd } AND A.UPSO_CD = B.UPSO_CD(+) AND A.REPT_DAY = B.REPT_DAY(+) AND A.REPT_NUM = B.REPT_NUM(+) AND A.UPSO_CD = C.UPSO_CD(+) AND A.REPT_DAY = C.REPT_DAY(+) AND A.REPT_NUM = C.REPT_NUM(+) AND A.RECV_DAY >= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6), 'YYYYMM') || '01' GROUP BY A.REPT_DAY, A.REPT_NUM, A.BANK_CD, A.ACCN_NUM, A.REPT_AMT, A.MAPPING_DAY, A.RECV_DAY, A.REPTPRES, B.UPSO_CD, C.UPSO_CD ORDER BY RECV_DAY DESC ) ) A ORDER BY R_NUM
